message: Let's start with a fair deal, Bob. I'll take the lion's share, but I'm open to negotiation.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of either
Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a better share than your last offer.
I'm not going to give up yet. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm still not willing to give away too much
Okay, Bob, I'm getting tired of this. I'll take your last offer, but I'm not happy about it.  Let's just end this.
